name: UnderHunter
description:
UnderHunter is a fast-paced action game where you switch between games. In the first game you run away from a ghost through a maze and jump over spikes. Make sure to watch your stamina when shooting or running so you don't hurt yourself. In the second game you fight the ghost in an undertale themed battle.

 Use LMB too shoot in game one. In game 1, shooting helps you make a path and move to the mouse with W. Space to jump and shift to run.

In the Undertale ghost fight click fight or keypad 0 to start. Spam or hold space to fire. Arrow keys to move.
